website_summaries.verdict: The ubiquity of the social network means that you can message just about anyone with the excellent Facebook Messenger app for Android.
pros: Just about everyone is already signed up

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant for family and friends contact.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant for keeping in touch with friends and family, with both text and video calls.
customer_reviews.author: CognacT

customer_reviews.title: useful for some things
customer_reviews.text: i don't use face book to much. i don't think to much social media is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: k.r.

customer_reviews.title: Great app
customer_reviews.text: Excellent app makes messaging on Facebook possible. Just as good as IOS and Andriod versions
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Very good ap.
customer_reviews.text: A good tool used in conjunction with Fb. Does the job. Simple to use

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great to chat if you can't get a signal to text
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Danson

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I supose it's good for keeping in touch with people who are on messenger but I prefere whatsap i do use messenger now and then
customer_reviews.author: Shirleyhilton

customer_reviews.title: I resent being forced to take this application in facebook on my mobile device.
customer_reviews.text: Is it just because kids have the attention span of Goldfish and need to be re-confused every two weeks just to keep them interested? I hate the way they mess about with the interface and options every time they do another automatic, unwanted update!
customer_reviews.author: Bazz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good way for people to keep in touch. The messenger on facebook doesn't work on my phone.

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed.

customer_reviews.title: i love this, as a dont need my wifi on ...
customer_reviews.text: i love this,as a dont need my wifi on to use this wen im out side..

customer_reviews.title: For someone who isn't as techno cool. I had to ask my daughters how to ...
customer_reviews.text: For someone who isn't as techno cool. I had to ask my daughters how to get it to work. Still not over familiar with sending and receiving messages, but it is a way of contacting people
customer_reviews.author: Jackster

customer_reviews.title: It's cool x
customer_reviews.text: It's ok when I ring or video someone but I echo to them and if the ring or video me I can hear time and them echo it more when u put the video on than ring in other than that it great x

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good to keep up with people without telling the world

customer_reviews.text: Good and fast way to stay in touch with friends.

customer_reviews.title: I don't want to be visible !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. Always visible. Wants too much personal info and too many permissions! Was better when it was a little messenger service link inside Facebook. As a stand alone programme it is no longer a pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Susan A. Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: I lost my mobile with this app on and so ...

customer_reviews.text: Best way to stay in contact with facebook friends but would like it if the writing pane size can adjusted.

customer_reviews.title: Messenger, to keep in contact.
customer_reviews.text: Great app for instant messageing especially if the battery is down on your mobile. You can send photos, emojis to friends listed in your Facebook no matter where you are in the world providing you have wifi connection.

customer_reviews.title: Messenger
customer_reviews.text: Think this is such a good app, ideal for keeping in touch with family, friends, so easy to use.

customer_reviews.text: Its so easy to use. Its an instant messenger... Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use

customer_reviews.title: Facebook Messenger
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant and so easy for anyone not completely computer literate.
customer_reviews.author: Jaybird

customer_reviews.title: Taking over
customer_reviews.text: Wish I hadn't signed up to this, I use it all the time but it pervades everything which I don't like and seems impossible to delete
customer_reviews.author: K. Russell

customer_reviews.title: 100% dissatisfied with Facebook the Paedophiles playground
customer_reviews.text: I try to hate no thing in this world or outside of it ... Though Facebook as a whole - I dislike immensely and no longer use it It allows Paedophiles to share unspeakable things - all of which are beyond harmful and I have no doubt that this app allows them to communicate with each other with ease ... I do not recommend FB for any reason other than if you are a business
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for keeping in touch with my overseas children. Love it, so easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try. it easy.
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. Quicker then Facebook on it own. Whilst reading on my Kindle, it pops up authenticating up what you are reading.

customer_reviews.title: I don't personally use face book.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing App

I am very grateful for this information and now I can speak and see my Dear Friend and that's Great, I would recommend this app to all looking for an alternative way of Chatting. 10/10

customer_reviews.title: Really annoying
customer_reviews.text: I have this on my android phone and it works fine, however, on my Kindle Fire HD it is really annoying. The app in itself works as it should, however, once you have a chat head active the Silk browser won't work until you get rid of the chat head and the only way to get rid of the chat head is to restart the Kindle as the chat head goes so far to the side of the screen you can't swipe it away! Have uninstalled.
